授業方法:
-Classes will be conducted face-to-face Primarily the Socratic method of course delivery. 
-The course will not have any formal exams. 
-Students will be expected to read pre-assigned business Cases prior to class for in-depth discussions in class. 
-Other evaluation methods will include asynchronous activities for online post and comments. 
-Two reflection papers will be evaluated midterm (covering the first half of the course) and final paper (second half of the course).
